articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun at 00:00, Monday, the Day of the Shining Star.
					 Kim Jong Un entered the hall where the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are standing.
					
					 The chief of the guard of honor of the Ground, Navy, Air and Anti-Air Force of the KPA and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards made a salute to the statues.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un was placed before the statues.
					
					 Also laid before them was a floral basket in the name of the KPA.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, together with other visitors, paid high tribute to the statues.
					
					 He entered the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state.
					
					 He, together with other visitors, paid homage to Kim Jong Il in the humblest reverence for him. 
					
					 He went round the hall where orders Kim Jong Il received are on display, the mourners' hall and halls which house a car, electric car, boat and train coach used by him.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Won Hong, So Hong Chan, Kim Chun Sam, Pak Yong Sik, Ryom Chol Song and other commanding officers of the KPA and those of the services and corps level units of the KPA.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Issues Order to Promote Military Ranks of KPA Commanding Officers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Issues Order to Promote Military Ranks of KPA Commanding Officers 
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un issued an order to promote the military ranks of KPA commanding officers on February 14 on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il). 
					 According to the order of the supreme commander, the title of Ground colonel general was conferred on Choe Kyong Song, the title of Ground lieutenant general on Kang Yong Thae, Choe Chang Sik, Kang Pyong Hu, Sin Sok Man, So Tae Ha and Pak Kyong Uk, the title of Air Force major general on Jong Se Yong and Ri Il Chan, the title of Strategic Force major general on Kim Jong Sik, and the title of Ground major general on Pak Myong Su, Ko Myong Su, Kim Song Guk, Choe Kil Ryong, Ko Su Yong, Kim Yong Nam, Pak Hyon Bok, Ri Jong Sop, Kang Myong Sik, Kim Kyong Dok, Ju Sang Rae, Choe Chol Hwan, Kim Chol Su, Ju Hyong Nam, Kim Jong Gil, Won Myong Su and Hong Kyong Chol. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed belief that the KPA commanding officers, descendants of President Kim Il Sung and soldiers and disciples of leader Kim Jong Il, will fulfill their honorable responsibilities and duties in the general offensive to hasten the final victory in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, always bearing mind the trust and expectation of the party and the people.

articles.title: Letter from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Letter from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Monday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The letter paid the highest tribute to Kim Jong Il and extended the greatest glory to Kim Jong Un who is leading to victory the Juche cause and the patriotic cause of Chongryon pioneered and led by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the significant Day of the Shining Star, in reflection of the intense loyalty of all officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan. 
					
					 General Kim Jong Il, the greatest man possessed of matchless political statesmanship and leadership trait and utmost sincerity, defended and glorified the socialist homeland by dedicating himself all his life and laid an eternal cornerstone for building a rich and powerful nation by taking the road of patriotic devotion to the country and its people till the last moments of his revolutionary life, it noted.
					
					 He was the warm sun of the Koreans in Japan as he clearly indicated the way to be followed by Chongryon and Koreans in Japan with his gifted wisdom and far-sightedness and took warm care of them as their real father would do, it said.
					
					 It evinced the resolution to put greater spurs to the movement for greeting the 60th anniversary of the formation of Chongryon with signal successes for ushering in a new heyday, keeping step with the people in the homeland who have turned out as one in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu.

articles.title: Letter from C.C., AINDF
articles.content:
Letter from C.C., AINDF
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front on Monday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The letter paid high tribute to General Kim Jong Il, the eternal image of the powerful Paektusan nation and banner of all victories and glories, and extended the greatest glory and warmest congratulations to Marshal Kim Jong Un who is opening up a broad avenue of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu, in reflection of the boundless reverence of the vanguard fighters and people from all walks of life in the south.
					
					 It noted that the revolutionary career of the General was the most glorious one of the distinguished revolutionary and peerless patriot who dashed ahead like the wind towards the brilliant victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche with the soul and spirit of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 He made a bold decision to bring about an epochal phase of national reunification and ushered in the June 15 era of excitement and joy in the land of the south and the north of Korea which was frozen due to confrontation and distrust, instilling the bright hope for independent reunification into all Koreans, it said.
					
					 It evinced the resolution to wage an all-out struggle for achieving the great unity and solidarity of the nation and implementing the historic July 4 joint statement, June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration under the banner of Our Nation Itself, regarding the great programme for independent reunification set forth in Kim Jong Un's historic New Year address as coordinates of life and struggle. 
					
					 It underlined the need for the patriotic democratic forces to turn out as one to resolutely shatter the moves of the U.S. and pro-U.S. sycophantic and treacherous forces to ignite a war against the north and escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen and their despicable "human rights" racket against the DPRK and deal a heavy blow at the evermore undisguised moves of the conservative ruling forces to crack down on progressive forces, eliminate forces following the north and revive the "yusin" dictatorship.

articles.title: Reception Given on Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Reception Given on Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday, the 73rd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 It was attended by Choe Ryong Hae and other senior officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, heroes and those who had the honor of being received by the leaders and persons of merit. 
					
					 Also present there were overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of the missions of international organizations here and their wives, military attaches and their wives.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, said in his speech that the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il was the most brilliant one of a great revolutionary, peerless patriot and Songun brilliant commander. 
					
					 He paid highest tribute to Kim Jong Il and extended eternal glory to him, representing the unanimous feelings of the whole army and all people. 
					
					 He called on the whole party and army and all people to form a fortress, single-mindedly united around Marshal Kim Jong Un, and protect him with their lives and remain true to his monolithic leadership.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will successfully carry out the behests of Kim Jong Il and thus build a rich and powerful paradise of the people, the best power on this land without fail, he noted. 
					
					 He clarified the stand of the WPK and the government of the DPRK to write a new history of independent reunification as desired by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, boost the friendship with the peace-loving countries and make positive efforts to achieve common prosperity of mankind.

articles.title: Senior Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Senior Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Leading officials of the party and the state visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Monday, the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il).
					 Among them were Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party and officials of the party and power organs, Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Seen standing before the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of the KPA was also seen before the statues.
					
					 Placed there was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK, and the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 The participants paid high tribute to the statues, looking back on the revolutionary lives of the peerlessly great men who performed undying feats before the party, revolution, the country and its people and laid an eternal cornerstone for the victorious advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 At the hall of immortality where Kim Jong Il lies in state, they paid homage to him.
					
					 Then they looked round the hall where orders he received are on display, a mourners' hall and the halls that house a car, electric car, boat and train coach.

articles.title: Fireworks Displayed in Sky over Pyongyang to Celebrate Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Fireworks Displayed in Sky over Pyongyang to Celebrate Day of Shining Star
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Fireworks were displayed in the sky over Pyongyang at 00:00 hour on Feb. 16, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star). 
					  Kim Il Sung Square centering on the bank of the River Taedong where the Tower of the Juche Idea stands, Mansu Hill, Okryu Bridge and other parts of Pyongyang were crowded with people from all walks of life, school youth and children waiting for the fireworks gala.
					
					 To the tune of Song "The General Will Live Forever as the Sun" fireworks were displayed in the nocturnal sky of Pyongyang.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, people and school youth and children visited the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and portraits of the smiling Generalissimos across the country and paid high tribute to them on Monday, the Day of the Shining Star (Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary).
					 A great number of service personnel, people and school youth and children in Pyongyang visited the statues on Mansu Hill.
					
					 Seen before the statues was a floral basket sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, and institutions, enterprises, factories, farms and schools at all levels in Pyongyang, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Also placed there was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Recollecting the undying feats the peerlessly great men performed by creating the glorious ever-victorious history of the Juche revolution and the Songun revolution and laying the eternal foundation for the prosperity of the nation, while setting their hearts ablaze with the spirit of a red flag on Mt. Paektu all their lives, the visitors paid tribute to the statues.
					
					 Laid before the statues and portraits at Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, Ministry of People's Security, Mansudae Art Studio and other parts of Pyongyang were floral baskets in the name of units of the KPA, institutions and enterprises, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children across the country visited the statues and portraits and paid high tribute to them.

articles.title: Foreigner Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreigner Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of missions of international bodies here, military attaches of foreign embassies here and other foreign guests and overseas Koreans staying in the homeland visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Monday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They paid tribute to the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the hall of immortality where Kim Jong Il lies in state they made a bow to him.
					
					 They went round the hall where orders he received are on display and halls that house a car, electric car, boat and train coach.
					
					 Meanwhile, Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, and staff members of his mission visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on the same day and paid tribute to Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Performance Given by National Symphony Orchestra
articles.content:
Performance Given by National Symphony Orchestra
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A performance "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il" was given by the National Symphony Orchestra on Monday, the 73rd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Put on the stage which started with overture "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il" were such numbers as orchestras "General on a Galloping White Horse" and "Our General Is the Best."
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the exploits of Kim Jong Il who was born as the Shining Star over Mt. Paektu and dedicated himself to the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people in the whole period of leading the revolution with the noble intention to glorify Korea.
					
					 Also put on the stage were such numbers as violin concerto "Firm Resolve" and orchestras "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass", "Song of Big Fish Haul" and "Footstep."
					
					 Among the audience were working people here.

articles.title: Joint National Meeting of KCU Organizations Held
articles.content:
Joint National Meeting of KCU Organizations Held
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union organizations took place at the Taekwon-Do Hall here on Monday, the 73rd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were representatives of KCU organizations in provinces, schoolchildren here and those entering the KCU.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop and officials of the youth league, officials concerned, war veterans and persons of merit.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said Kim Jong Il was born in Mt. Paektu on February 16, Juche 31 (1942) as son of guerrillas, adding this was Korea's great fortune and a great auspicious event for the Korean nation as it opened up a rosy future of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, though he was so busy steering the drive for defending socialism and building a thriving nation, took warm care of the study and life of schoolchildren as their real mothers and fathers would do and showed all his loving care for them so that they might learn to their heart's content with nothing to desire more in the world and have ample knowledge, high morality and strong bodies, the reporter said, adding:
					
					 Respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, who inherited the noble love of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the rising generation, personally made a congratulatory speech at a grand meeting of KCU members and had a photo taken with KCU delegates and made sure that a study tour of schoolchildren from across the country was held with splendor along the course of the 250-mile journey for national liberation this year. 
					
					 The reporter underscored the need for all KCU members to prepare themselves as dependable heirs to the Songun revolutionary cause under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Then followed a new-member admission ceremony of the KCU.

articles.title: Art Performance Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Art Performance Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- An art performance "We will carry on the march started from Mt. Paektu" was given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League at the Central Youth Hall on Monday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Put on the stage were such numbers as small chorus "Song of General Kim Jong Il" and dialogic poem "Cherishing soul of Paektu."
					
					 The performers paid highest tribute and extended eternal glory to Kim Jong Il who was born as the Shining Star over Mt. Paektu and performed undying exploits for the times and revolution, the country and its people with his extraordinary wisdom and outstanding leadership.
					
					 Also staged were numbers reflecting the faith and will of the young vanguard to build a manifold fortress to protect Kim Jong Un and perform heroic feats on all fronts for building a thriving nation.
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, officials concerned, those of the youth league, youth and students.

articles.title: Dancing Parties Celebrate Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Celebrate Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students on Monday celebrated the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 At the venues of the dancing parties, the youth and students presented dances to the tune of songs "Please Accept Best Wishes of People" and "Let's Sing of General Dear to People."
					
					 They were full of ardent yearnings and reverence for Kim Jong Il as they danced to the tune of songs "Greeting Spring on Jong Il Peak" and "The General Star beyond the Clouds."
					
					 Song "Victory Will Be Won Generation after Generation" revved up the atmosphere of the dancing parties.
					
					 The enthusiastically dancing youth and students were confident of the bright future of the country.

articles.title: Paektusan Prize Sports Contest Closes
articles.content:
Paektusan Prize Sports Contest Closes
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The 20th Paektusan Prize Sports Contest among Officials of National Institutions closed with due ceremony at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Monday.
					 The State Planning Commission, the Foreign Trade Bank of the DPRK, the Kumgang Guidance Bureau and the Korean Central News Agency placed the first at the contest.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated across Country
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated across Country
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The entire army and all the people of the country celebrated the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il as the greatest national holiday.
					 Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to pay respects to them.
					
					 An endless stream of people visited the venue of the 19th Kimjongilia Festival and the Kimjongilia exhibitions now underway in Pyongyang and in provinces in deep reverence.
					
					 Concert "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il" was given by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre, an art performance was given by the Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe at the People's Palace of Culture and a performance was presented by the National Circus at the Pyongyang Circus Theater.
					
					 Artistes and officials of organs of South Hamgyong Province gave an art performance at the Hamhung Grand Theater.
					
					 Concerts also took place at the construction site of the power stations in tiers on the River Chongchon and at other units. 
					
					 Many schoolchildren joined the Korean Children's Union.
					
					 Commercial and public catering facilities across the country were busy serving holiday makers.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Propagated Worldwide
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Propagated Worldwide
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Kimjongilia, an immortal flower, has been cultivated in more than 70 countries after its birth.
					 Mototeru Kamo, a horticulturist of Japan, bred this flower in praise of leader Kim Jong Il in Juche 77 (1988).
					
					 A large number of Kimjongilia associations emerged in different countries to propagate the immortal flower and Kimjongilia shows took place on 100-odd occasions worldwide. The groups include the Nordic Kimjongilia Association in Sweden and the Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia.
					
					 The International Society for Horticultural Science registered Kimjongilia as a new variety of begonia family and awarded the best prizes to it at international flower shows and expos, including the 12th International Flower Exhibition in May 1991, the Nordic flower exhibition in Sweden in March 1995, the begonia exhibition in California, U.S. in August 2004 and the 2012 world horticultural expo in Netherlands.
					
					 Kimjongilia won the top prize at the Mongolian International Flower Exhibition last year and a special prize at the 2014 Qingdao World Horticultural Expo.
					
					 The worldwide interest in Kimjongilia is growing deeper with each passing day.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Life Dedicated to People
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Life Dedicated to People
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The people in the DPRK are holding in high esteem Generalissimo Kim Jong Il as their eternal leader, as he dedicated his all to their happiness in his lifetime.
					 It was Kim Jong Il's lifetime motto to believe in the people as in Heaven. The popular masses are an almighty being and one should pluck even a star and bring a flower into bloom even on a rock if they want. This was his principle and will.
					
					 Enduring his mental and physical fatigue, he had made a ceaseless journey of field guidance for the people's wellbeing till the last moments of his life, regarding their happiness as his greatest pleasure.
					
					 He had always considered the people's demands and will as a criterion in adopting any state and party line and policy.
					
					 In his lifetime he visited more than 14,290 units across the country, the course of which covers 670,000 kilometers, nearly 17 times the distance round the earth.

articles.title: Military Attaches Visit Kimjongilia Festival Venue
articles.content:
Military Attaches Visit Kimjongilia Festival Venue
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the venue of the 19th Kimjongilia Festival on Monday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They went round with keen interest immortal flowers in bloom by boundless reverence of the Korean army and people and world progressives highly praising Kim Jong Il as the outstanding Songun brilliant commander.
					
					 At the end of the visit they made entries in the visitor's book. 
					
					 Le Duy Long, military attache of the Vietnamese embassy, wrote that immortal flower Kimjongilia in bloom is associated with the boundless reverence of the Korean people for the great leader.
					
					 Alexei Bartusov, military attache of the Russian embassy, wrote that the Kimjongila festival is a significant one showing the profound reverence of the Korean people for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Roman O. Jimenez Ortega, military attache of the Cuban embassy, noted that he got to know better about the DPRK where the leader and people formed a harmonious whole through the visit. He wished the Korean people greater success in their efforts for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Papers Mark Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Papers Mark Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK's leading newspapers Monday dedicate editorials to the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (February 16). They say thanks to the day the bloodline of Paektu and the lifeline of the Juche-oriented revolution have been given steady continuity, the dignity and status of the Workers' Party of Korea, the country and the independent Korean people were placed on the highest level and the history of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea has made a triumphant advance.
					 Rodong Sinmun says it is a great pride and fortune for the service personnel and people of the DPRK to have made revolution, having Kim Jong Il, a prominent elder statesman recognized by the world and a peerless patriot, at the top posts of the party and the state.
					
					 His revolutionary career was a sacred course in which he made sure that the WPK and the country demonstrated their might as an invincible fortress steering the era of independence and an undying history in which he glorified the WPK as a strong political staff of the revolution and the country as the one of miracles, it notes, adding:
					
					 His revolutionary career is also characterized by the exploits he performed for developing the WPK and the country into the genuine ones for people by pursuing the politics of giving priority to them and with his love for them.
					
					 He was a peerlessly great man who set an epoch-making example in building the party and the state with his gifted ideological and theoretical wisdom and superb leadership ability for more than half a century and thus provided an eternal foundation for the victorious advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun and lasting prosperity of the Korean people.
					
					 Noting that Marshal Kim Jong Un is the supreme leader of the WPK and the country who represents the destiny and future of the Korean people, the paper calls on all service personnel and people to strive hard to add shine to the glorious party of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and great Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea, united close around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Minju Joson calls for invariably and dynamically advancing along the road of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, cherishing deep in mind the great national pride of holding Kim Jong Il praised by the world as the eternal leader of the WPK and revolution in high esteem.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked by Chongryon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked by Chongryon
 Tokyo, February 14 (KNS-KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Japan took place at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on Feb. 14 to celebrate the 73rd birth anniversary of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					 Seen standing before the portrait of the smiling Generalissimo was a floral basket praying for his immortality.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), and other Chongryon officials, Koreans in Japan and teachers and students of Korean University.
					
					 Ho Jong Man said in a report that Kim Jong Il was born in Mt. Paektu during the anti-Japanese war and grew up, undergoing the hardships no one experienced. He dedicated himself, cherishing all his life the firm faith and iron will to make the Korean people the happiest one and the DPRK the best one, the reporter noted, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a world-class military power and a nuclear weapons state despite the moves of the U.S.-led international reactionary forces to isolate and stifle the DPRK, a socialist fortress. This is his immortal feats to go down in the national history.
					
					 He was the outstanding leader who steered the movement of Koreans in Japan to victory and boundlessly tender-hearted father who brought the happiness to Koreans in Japan and rosy future to their generations to come.
					
					 The reporter called upon all Koreans in Japan to dynamically advance, getting united single-mindedly, to glorify forever the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il and the undying leadership feats he performed for the movement of Koreans in Japan and strengthen the patriotic movement of Chongryon as required by the glorious Kim Jong Un's era under his leadership.
					
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was read out at the meeting.
					
					 Similar meetings took place at the Osaka, Hyogo, Kyoto, Aichi, Ibaragi, Hiroshima, Fukuoka, Hokkaido, Okayama and other headquarters of Chongryon on the same day.
					
					 Concert "Eternal Song of Sun" was given by the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe of Chongryon and a photo exhibition of Chongryon was held on the same day.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by German Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by German Organization
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- An article titled "Life for future" was posted by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on its website on Feb. 10 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The article said:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, dedicated himself to translating the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung into reality and bringing earlier the bright future of Korea all his life.
					
					 Such many gigantic undertakings for the bright future of the country as the satellite manufacture and launch entirely with its own indigenous efforts and technology, large-scale land realignment, project for laying gravity-fed waterway, work for turning the country into a thick woodland and greenery, construction of many power stations, factories which can serve as icons  in the age of knowledge-based economy, the  world's leading fruit production bases and the development of scenic spots including Mt. Kuwol, Mt. Chilbo and Ryongmun Cavern were carried out thanks to the iron will and wise guidance of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He found the greatest honor, happiness and joy in devoting himself to the country and its people. He provided ceaseless field guidance day and night, having a short and uncomfortable sleep and taking a rice ball as his meal in train and car.
					
					 The venerable image of Kim Jong Il who devoted his all to the bright future of the country and its people will always be remembered not only by the Korean people but by the world progressives.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Katmandu and seminars in Helsinki and Prague on Feb. 4 and 7 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting his noble revolutionary career and immortal feats, and the revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also display there were books including works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and photos showing the army and people of the DPRK out in the drive to build a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The minister of Women, Children and Social Welfare of Nepal said that HE Kim Jong Il was a outstanding statesman who made a distinguished contribution to defending socialism from the vicious moves of the imperialists and ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world by pursuing his original Songun politics.
					
					 C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) and chairman of the Nepali national preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star, praised Kim Jong Il as a great teacher and great man who dedicated himself to the revolution and the people all his life and led the party, army and people to victory for a long period, performing undying feats.
					
					 Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, and Juha Kieksy, chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, lauded Kim Jong Il as the most distinguished thinker and theoretician and statesman produced by the world.
					
					 The secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party said that the DPRK is fully displaying its might as an invulnerable socialist fortress thanks to Kim Jong Un, creditable successor to the cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Nepal and Finland.

articles.title: Mexican Political Figure Pays Highest Tribute to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Mexican Political Figure Pays Highest Tribute to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, issued a statement on Feb. 9 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The statement said:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il pursued the great Songun politics under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea and firmly defended the sovereignty of the Korean nation and world socialism. 
					
					 His great revolutionary idea and cause are being successfully carried forward by Comrade Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 All the party members of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico pay the highest tribute to Kim Jong Il who built the DPRK into the powerful socialist state and made a great contribution to the victorious advance of the cause of world socialism on the occasion of the significant Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Cambodia, Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Cambodia, Myanmar
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Delegations of the Ministry of the Royal Palace of Cambodia, Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar and Myanmar Medical Research Institute visited the DPRK embassies in their countries on Jan. 30 and Feb. 11 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of Shining Star).
					 The members of the delegations laid floral baskets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid a tribute to them.
					
					 Tin Tin Moe, member of the Executive Committee of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, said that his party members look back upon the immortal feats Kim Jong Il performed for the Korean people's happiness and prosperity and the cause of global independence on the occasion of the significant Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's idea and cause are being successfully carried forward by respected HE Kim Jong Un, he said, adding:
					
					 The Korean people have achieved astonishing successes in building a thriving socialist nation and bolstering up the defence capability under his wise leadership.
					
					 The party is convinced that the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people will build a thriving nation and achieve the cause of Korea's reunification without fail under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A seminar was held by the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, meeting by the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and lecture by the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association on Feb. 7 and 9 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Sazhi Umalatova, chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, in a report praised Kim Jong Il as the great general, genuine patriot and defender of justice and peace. The DPRK today would be unthinkable apart from the firm foundation provided and feats performed by Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the great leaders of the Korean people, she noted, and went on:
					
					 The personality of Kim Jong Il as a great man will always be remembered by us.
					
					 The DPRK is led by passionate and experienced Comrade Kim Jong Un. I wholeheartedly wish him greater success in his noble work for building a thriving nation and improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il the DPRK victoriously concluded the Arduous March and emerged a nuclear weapons state and satellite manufacturer and launcher.
					
					 Viktor Yegorov, chairman of the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association, said that the Russian people would always remember the feats performed by Kim Jong Il in developing the Russia-DPRK friendly relations.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Held in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Held in Foreign Countries 
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows were held by the Socialist Party of Romania, the Public Center for Diplomatic and Cultural Exchange of China, two Indonesian companies, Dombo Enterprise Company of Malaysia, an institution of Ethiopia and in Zamfara and Anambra states of Nigeria from February 3 to 10 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Korean films including "Birthplace of Kim Jong Il in Mt. Paektu in All Its Glory" and "Arms of Korea" were screened. 
					
					 The chairman of the Arab Information Centre in China said Kim Jong Il was the great leader who performed undying exploits for building a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 The general director of an Indonesian company said not only the Korean people but also people of many foreign countries always remember Kim Jong Il as he developed the DPRK into a strong military power.
					
					 The manager of another Indonesian company said he could know well about the validity and vitality of Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il after watching the film. 
					
					 The manager of the Malaysian company praised Kim Jong Il as the eternal sun of Songun and prominent statesman who brought the prosperous future with the might of Songun through the unique Songun politics unprecedented in the history.

articles.title: US Accused of Its Human Rights Racket against DPRK
articles.content:
US Accused of Its Human Rights Racket against DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Sazhi Umalatova, chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, released an article titled "U.S. fears genuine human rights performance in DPRK" on a website on Feb. 5.
					 The article said:
					
					 The U.S. decided "to protect" human rights in the DPRK just as it did in Iraq, Libya, Afghanistan, Ukraine and other countries.
					
					 All people lead a happy life and their honor and dignity are guaranteed in the DPRK. The U.S. is keen to encroach upon the stability and security in such DPRK.
					
					 Any "report" on "human rights abuses" in the DPRK is nonsensical and touches off hatred only.
					
					 The history of the U.S. began with man killings, the article said, citing detailed human rights abuses of the U.S.
					
					 "American-style democracy" and "American-style human rights" are the factor of causing political chaos and war in the world at present, it said, and went on:
					
					 There is neither jobless man nor illiterate in the DPRK and its citizens receive ample benefits such as free education and health care and are provided with dwelling houses free of charge.
					
					 The DPRK emerged a nuclear weapons state and a space power. It solves everything with its own natural resources and means.
					
					 It holds in high esteem the great leader who is thoroughly protecting the dignity, honor and interests of the country and its people.
					
					 All provocations of the U.S. against the DPRK are an expression of the former's weakness and an index of its total political ruin.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mexico
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential For Accomplishing Socialism" was brought out in booklet by the Publishing House of the Workers' Party of Mexico on Feb. 9.
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 84 (1995), clarifies the idea that in order to successfully accomplish the socialist cause it is necessary to make the ideological work a key priority with a firm hold on it. It also says that the basic task of the ideological work is to imbue the whole society with the socialist idea and that the ideological work should be conducted on the basis of the principle and method suited to the intrinsic requirements of socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan con motivo del 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan con motivo del 16 de febrero
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia de la Estrella Luz, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito a la hora 0 del dia 16 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan para rendir el homenaje postumo al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					El entro en el hall donde se encuentran las estatuas de pie de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					El jefe de la guardia de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC y del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino dio el parte de recepcion hacia las estatuas.
					
					Fueron colocados ante las estatuas un cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal y el otro en nombre del EPC.
					
					Junto con los participantes, Kim Jong Un rindio homenaje a los Generalisimos ante las estatuas.
					
					En el salon de eternidad, donde esta conservado el cuerpo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el Mariscal volvio a rendirle tributo con los participantes.
					
					Acto seguido, recorrio el hall de llantos, las salas de conservacion de las ordenes recibidas por el Dirigente, el carro, coche electrico, barco y tren utilizados por el.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Won Hong, So Hong Chan, Kim Chun Sam, Pak Yong Sik, Ryom Chol Song y otros miembros de mando del EPC y los comandantes de las unidades de tipos de ejercito y de nivel de cuerpo del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un ordena ascender grado militar de los comandantes del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un ordena ascender grado militar de los comandantes del EPC
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dio el dia 14 la orden de elevar los grados militares de los comandantes del EPC, con motivo del Dia de la Estrella Luz (dia de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il).
					Segun la orden, el grado de coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres se ha otorgado a Choe Kyong Song; el de teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres a Kang Yong Thae, Choe Chang Sik, Kang Pyong Hu, Sin Sok Man, So Tae Ha y Pak Kyong Uk; el de mayor general de las fuerzas aereas a Jong Se Yong y Ri Il Chan; el de mayor general de las fuerzas estrategicas a Kim Jong Sik; el de mayor general de las fuerzas terrestres a Pak Myong Su, Ko Myong Su, Kim Song Guk, Choe Kil Ryong, Ko Su Yong, Kim Yong Nam, Pak Hyon Bok, Ri Jong Sop, Kang Myong Sik, Kim Kyong Dok, Ju Sang Rae, Choe Chol Hwan, Kim Chol Su, Ju Hyong Nam, Kim Jong Gil, Won Myong Su y Hong Kyong Chol.
					
					El Comandante Supremo expreso la seguridad de que teniendo siempre presente la confianza y esperanza del partido y el pueblo, los comandantes del EPC, descendientes del Presidente Kim Il Sung y soldados y discipulos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, cumpliran con su honrosa responsabilidad y deber en la ofensiva general para adelantar la victoria final con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu.

articles.title: Tiene lugar banquete por el 73o aniversario de natalicio de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tiene lugar banquete por el 73o aniversario de natalicio de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 16 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el banquete por el 73o aniversario de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					Asistieron Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito,  el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, heroes, hombres benemeritos y personas que fueron recibidas por el Dirigente. 
					
					Tambien estuvieron presentes los compatriotas residentes en ultramar y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang. 
					
					Fueron invitados los matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los de agregados militares, acreditados en Corea.
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra, Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario, del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, dijo que la vida revolucionaria del Dirigente fue la mas brillante del gran revolucionario, patriota sin igual y general insigne del Songun. 
					
					Dedico el mas sublime homenaje y eterna gloria al Generalisimo Kim Jong Il en representacion de todos los militares y civiles. 
					
					Llamo a todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo a defender a riesgo de la vida al Mariscal Kim Jong Un consolidando la unidad monolitica y apoyar con fidelidad su unica direccion.
					
					Apunto que el ejercito y pueblo coreanos levantaran sin falta un paraiso del pueblo y mejor potencia del mundo realizando el legado del Dirigente. 
					
					Expuso la posicion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del gobierno de la RPDC de escribir una nueva historia de reunificacion independiente, fortalecer la amistad con los paises amantes de la paz y realizar ingentes esfuerzos por la prosperidad comun de la humanidad, como deseaban los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Periodicos dedican editoriales al dia de natalicio de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Periodicos dedican editoriales al dia de natalicio de Kim Jong Il 
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- En los editoriales publicados este lunes con motivo del dia de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los periodicos coreanos apuntan que gracias a ese dia historico, continua el linaje del Paektu y de la revolucion jucheana, llegaron a la cima la dignidad independiente y la posicion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, la patria y el pueblo coreano y transcurre firmemente la historia de victorias de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y la Corea de Kim Jong Il. 
					El diario Rodong Sinmun senala que el ejercito y pueblo coreanos tienen el gran orgullo y fortuna de tener en el supremo puesto del partido y el Estado al destacado veterano politico y patriota sin igual venerado por todo el mundo, y continua:
					
					La vida revolucionaria del Dirigente brilla como sagrado trayecto en que consolido el PTC y la patria como invencibles baluartes que conducen la era de independencia y desarrollo el PTC como Estado Mayor politico de la revolucion y glorifico la patria como pais de milagros. 
					
					Durante toda su vida revolucionaria, el Dirigente fortalecio el PTC y la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como partido y patria madres. 
					
					En mas de medio siglo, el gran hombre sin igual creo con su genial inteligencia ideo-teorica y destacada capacidad directiva el modelo de la epoca de la construccion del partido y el Estado y preparo la eterna base para el avance victorioso de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y del Songun y la prosperidad del pueblo coreano. 
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un es el Maximo Dirigente del Partido y el Estado y representa el destino y el futuro del pueblo coreano. 
					
					Todos deben unirse compactamente en torno al Mariscal y luchar por hacer brillar el glorioso partido kimilsungista-kimjongilista y la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il. 
					
					El rotativo Minju Joson llama a marchar a pasos firmes por la unica senda del Juche, bajo la guia del Mariscal, guardando en lo profundo del corazon el gran honor y dignidad nacional de tener al Dirigente como eterno lider del PTC y de la revolucion coreana.
